overview_summary: Both identified neighbors keep a low public profile, with no recorded stances on development. Neither has openly supported or opposed projects, and community influence appears limited, as none hold formal local positions or notable public roles.

neighbors.name: Logan Buis
neighbors.claims: The Buis family name has longstanding roots in the southern Putnam County farming community ([genealogytrails.com](https://genealogytrails.com/ind/putnam/marriages.html#:~:text=HERBERT,of%20Cloverdale%2C%20were%20married%20at)). A partnership under the Buis name (Mike & Jeff Buis) based in nearby Martinsville has received over $217,000 in USDA farm subsidies tied to Putnam County acreage ([farm.ewg.org](https://farm.ewg.org/top_recips.php?fips=18133&page=1&progcode=total_dp#:~:text=21%20%20,%24210%2C773)). No mentions of Logan Buis were found in local meeting minutes or news archives, suggesting he has not publicly voiced opinions on development ([www.putnamcounty67.us](https://www.putnamcounty67.us/cgi.exe?CALL_PROGRAM=MINUTES&PAGEID=0010#:~:text=No%20,buis)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Local farm family, no public roles

approach_recommendations.engage: Reach out via an agricultural community contact highlighting respect for family farmland and continuity, emphasizing how the project can coexist with traditional farming.

neighbors.name: Mark E. and Julie M. Toebbe
neighbors.claims: Mark and Julie Toebbe are listed as co-owners of a Putnam County property according to county land records ([auditor.putnamcounty67.us](https://auditor.putnamcounty67.us/cgi.exe?CALL_PROGRAM=C009LIST#:~:text=Putnam%20County%20Government%2C%20Indiana%20Auditor,you%20can%20include%20city)). They do not appear in any local government minutes or civic news, indicating they maintain a private profile with no public stance noted ([treasurer.putnam.in.datapitstop.us](https://treasurer.putnam.in.datapitstop.us/cgi.exe?CALL_PROGRAM=C009WARNING&PAGEID=0009#:~:text=No%20,toebbe)). The absence of their names in tax delinquency or petition records further suggests they have had no controversial dealings or outspoken views in the community.

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach discreetly through a one-on-one visit or neighbor introduction, stressing minimal disturbance and respect for their privacy and property during project development.
